|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu '''rtl8822bu'''] |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Proware |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (slave) |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/09/2020 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B084WBTTN6 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1908192T3PLUS-1.0" and "Rev1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board. *[[TP-LINK Archer T3U Plus]] (V1) - USB 3.0 :802.11ac, 2.4/5GHz, 20dBm (EIRP) :57.8 × 18 × 173.4 mm; 140 g {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK}} ==Links of Interest== *{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/au/home-networking/adapter/archer-t3u-plus/}} (AU) *[https://www.tp-link.com/uk/home-networking/adapter/archer-t3u-plus/#specifications Spec.] (UK) *[https://www.tp-link.com/my/support/download/archer-t3u-plus/#Driver Support page] (MY) :USB ID (2357:0138) references * [https://www.raspberrypi.org/forums/viewtopic.php?t=279543 ''Driver for TP-LINK Archer T3U Plus WiFi adapter'' on '''Raspberrypi''' forums] * [https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu/blob/master/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c ''os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c'' @ ''jeremyb31/rtl8822bu'' on '''GitHub'''] ==Pictures==
